greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Primes from merging of 2 successive digits in decimal expansion of e.
comment: Scan decimal expansion of e from left to right, recording any 2-digit primes seen. Overlaps are allowed in all the sequences in this family. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 05 2012
Leading zeros are not permitted, so each term is 2 digits in length. [From Harvey P. Dale, Oct 23 2011]
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
xref: Cf. A001113, A073246 (the one-digit primes in e), A104844 - A104862.
results.author: Andrew G. West (WestA(AT)wlu.edu), Mar 27 2005
ext: Changed offset from 0 to 1 by _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 21 2013
